inventory.commentary: Note: I didn't see a way to separate these senses in a meaningful way since WN blended manual and figurative manipulation in sense 2.

sense.name: Manipulate manually or in one's mind or imagination, possibly in a playful way.
sense.examples: She toyed with her wedding ring. It's cruel the way Mary toys with John's emotions. He toyed with the idea of running for the Senate. He shouldn't toy with a young girl's affections.
